articles.title: Chevalier, or the so-called 'Black Mozart,' had a fascinating life. Now it's at the heart of a movie - CNN
articles.description: The film "Chevalier," is based on the life of Joseph Bologne, whose story is being brought to the big screen more than 200 years after his death. The composer's works are also being revisited by classical music giants to make sure his legacy persists.
